headline: A Look at Otis (OTIS) Valuation Following Gen3 Core Elevator Upgrades and Market Expansion
summary: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) has announced a significant upgrade to its Gen3 Core elevator lineup, now featuring larger door openings, increased load capacity, and smart digital enhancements. These additions are designed to better serve low-rise buildings across the U.S. and Canada. See our latest analysis for Otis Worldwide. These Gen3 Core enhancements arrive as Otis Worldwide’s share price has traded sideways recently, holding near $88.85. The company has achieved a long-term total shareholder...
